snippet: An inquiry into Questcor Pharmaceuticals’ marketing practices has cast a spotlight on an open secret: The bulk of the contributions that help patients pay for medicines come from the drug firms themselves.
abstract: Inquiry into Questcor Pharmaceuticals’ marketing practices and its relationship with co-payment assistance charity Chronic Disease Fund has cast a spotlight on an open secret: bulk of the contributions that help patients pay for medicines come from the drug firms themselves.
